about_the_game:
Game Info

Chrono Bullet is a bullet hell top-down shooter inspired by the classic arcade games. It tells the story about multiverses that heroes must protect, even at the cost of their lives. You will encounter many different fantasy monsters. But don’t be afraid: sleight of hand, reaction and a cool head will help you cope with them.

Characters

Expel uninvited guests from your realm. Monsters spread throughout the worlds, corrupting everything in their path. You must hone your skills and find the strength to defeat the evil creatures using unique hero abilities inspired by characters from folk tales and legends.

Dynamic Gameplay

You will have only 7 minutes to defeat monsters and escape the dungeon. You will need a strong build, focus and excellent teamwork. Increase your fighting power in battles then face the level boss when you feel ready… or when you no longer have a choice.

High Replay Value

Run after run, play as different heroes, make the most of the upgrades and items you find, and explore a randomly generated map with new activities and new enemies.

Play Together

Chrono Bullet aims to modernize the classic arcade in terms of controls, visual solutions, and difficulty. And, of course, co-op multiplayer. Where would we be without it? You will have to rebuild your kingdom on a piece of land that has remained untouched by monsters!

You can play this game duo with your friend. Or you can gather a team of four people and try to pass the most difficult realms together! While we still offer a hearty slice of nostalgia and good old, simple fun to you.
